testcase.classname: feature to test Jiva design style initial details screen functionality
testcase.name: To test the submit order details
testcase.system-out: Given User navigates to Login page..........................................passed Then User enters the username and password..................................passed And User click on the signIn................................................passed Then click on the SW Merchandising Module...................................passed And click on SW Data Entry dropdown.........................................passed And click on SW Style Initial Details screen................................passed And Click on the Styles Expansion...........................................passed Then Select the IPO from the list "IPO1706.2"...............................passed And Select file handover date"17062024".....................................passed Then click on Add combination button and enter combination names"Combo1" and "Combo2".passed And click on Submit order details button....................................passed And Verify whether the Garment Size type field data is displayed or not.....passed Given User enter the data in PO Qty field for combos........................passed And Enter the data in IPO% field in order details...........................passed And Click on the submit button..............................................passed
